review: One of the coolest devices ever.The simplest , zero-learning-curve, neat application to interact with your television set.Some tips:- Remember to go to the settings and uncheck the "share usage" to avoid privacy concerns.- Remember to check the offers very 3-4 weeks (from your device on which app is installed).- Can be powered by your TV. separate AC power not needed. Tried it on 2 different Samsung TVs.- Can be used as Karaoke machine (Search for song name and type karaoke on You tube). Had a great karaoke party at my place last month. Best part is with guest mode enabled everyone can queue their songs from their phones!I also own Fire TV and believe both products have their space on your TV set and can/should co-exist due to different value they provide.
author: TheCriticalViews

review: This device had such potential but Google didn't seem to do much with it. It works great if you're trying to duplicate what you have on your machine or device (youtube and netflix) but that's about it. For the price it's not bad but now with the FireTV Stick it kind of became obsolete.
